tool_description: Analyzes job descriptions to extract required skills, qualifications, keywords, and experience requirements for resume optimization targeting.

job_description.description: The complete job posting or description text

job_title.description: Specific job title from the posting

industry_sector.description: Industry sector: technology, healthcare, finance, education, manufacturing, retail, or other

experience_level.description: Target experience level: entry, mid, senior, executive

error_messages: Empty job description: Provide a non-empty job description with sufficient detail.
Invalid industry sector: Use one of [technology, healthcare, finance, education, manufacturing, retail, other].
Invalid experience level: Use one of [entry, mid, senior, executive].
Insufficient job details: Job description lacks enough information to extract meaningful requirements.
usage: Provide the job description text and optionally specify company name, job title, industry sector, and experience level for more targeted analysis.

required_skills.description: List of hard and soft skills mentioned as requirements

preferred_qualifications.description: List of preferred but not mandatory qualifications

key_keywords.description: Important keywords and phrases for ATS optimization

experience_requirements.description: Summary of experience requirements and expectations
